WarlockLevel6Spells.Name: Circle of Death
WarlockLevel6Spells.Description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out in a 60-foot-radius sphere from a point within range.

WarlockLevel6Spells.Name: Conjure Fey
WarlockLevel6Spells.Description: You summon a fey creature of challenge rating 6 or lower, or a fey spirit that takes the form of a beast of challenge rating 6 or lower.

WarlockLevel6Spells.Name: Create Undead
WarlockLevel6Spells.Description: You can cast this spell only at night.

WarlockLevel6Spells.Name: Eyebite
WarlockLevel6Spells.Description: Each creature in a 60-foot cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by one of the following effects of your choice for the duration.

WarlockLevel6Spells.Name: Flesh to Stone
WarlockLevel6Spells.Description: You attempt to turn one creature that you can see within range into stone.

WarlockLevel6Spells.Name: Mass Suggestion
WarlockLevel6Spells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence up to twelve creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear and understand you.

WarlockLevel6Spells.Name: True Seeing
WarlockLevel6Spells.Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are.
